languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Спешу сообщить новые сведения о ксеноустройстве, найденном вами во время вашего... отсутствия. С момента вашего возвращения техножрецы без устали были заняты познанием сути этой загадочной технологии и в какой-то степени преуспели. В результате множества обрядов и воззваний к Богу-Машине жрецы Механикус пробудили ксеноартефакт — на мгновение он воссоздал голографическую копию некоей планеты и координаты системы Пояс Лангренна. Возможно, вы захотите проверить лично, что находится в указанном месте".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан! Спешу сообщить новые сведения о ксеноустройстве, найденном вами во время вашего... отсутствия. С момента вашего возвращения техножрецы без устали были заняты познанием сути этой загадочной технологии и в какой-то степени преуспели. В результате множества обрядов и воззваний к Богу-Машине жрецы Механикус пробудили ксеноартефакт — на мгновение он воссоздал голографическую копию некоей планеты и координаты системы Пояс Лангренна. Возможно, вы захотите проверить лично, что находится в указанном месте".

languages.text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Спешу сообщить новые сведения о ксеноустройстве, найденном вами во время вашего... отсутствия. С момента вашего возвращения техножрецы без устали были заняты познанием сути этой загадочной технологии и в какой-то степени преуспели. В результате множества обрядов и воззваний к Богу-Машине жрецы Механикус пробудили ксеноартефакт — на мгновение он воссоздал голографическую копию некоей планеты и координаты системы Пояс Лангренна. Возможно, вы захотите проверить лично, что находится в указанном месте".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests made every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched those of the Langrenn's Belt System. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

"Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

languages.text: “舰长大人！关于您……离开的这段时间带回的异形装置，我为您带来了关于它的最新进展。自从您回来之后，技术神甫就一直在尽一切努力，试图理解这种神秘技术的本质，而他们也在某种程度上取得了成功。经过无数次仪式以及对万机之神的祈祷之后，他们唤醒了那件异形造物。那件造物一瞬间投射出了某颗行星的全息图像，坐标对应朗恩之带的某个区域。或许，您打算亲自看看那片区域究竟藏着什么秘密。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！关于您……离开的这段时间带回的异形装置，我为您带来了关于它的最新进展。自从您回来之后，技术神甫就一直在尽一切努力，试图理解这种神秘技术的本质，而他们也在某种程度上取得了成功。经过无数次仪式以及对万机之神的祈祷之后，他们唤醒了那件异形造物。那件造物一瞬间投射出了某颗行星的全息图像，坐标对应朗恩之带的某个区域。或许，您打算亲自看看那片区域究竟藏着什么秘密。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Ich bringe neue Informationen über das Xenogerät, das Ihr während Eurer ... Abwesenheit entdeckt habt. Seit Eurer Rückkehr setzen die Techpriester alles daran, das Wesen dieser mysteriösen Technologie zu verstehen — und es ist ihnen gelungen, bis zu einem gewissen Grad. Nach vielen Ritualen und Gebeten an den Maschinengott haben sie das Xeno-Artefakt erweckt. Einen einzigen Augenblick lang zeigte es eine holografische Kopie eines Planeten und Koordinaten, die zu einer Position in Langrenns Gürtel führen. Vielleicht wollt Ihr mit eigenen Augen sehen, was sich dort befindet."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Ich bringe neue Informationen über das Xenogerät, das Ihr während Eurer ... Abwesenheit entdeckt habt. Seit Eurer Rückkehr setzen die Techpriester alles daran, das Wesen dieser mysteriösen Technologie zu verstehen — und es ist ihnen gelungen, bis zu einem gewissen Grad. Nach vielen Ritualen und Gebeten an den Maschinengott haben sie das Xeno-Artefakt erweckt. Einen einzigen Augenblick lang zeigte es eine holografische Kopie eines Planeten und Koordinaten, die zu einer Position in Langrenns Gürtel führen. Vielleicht wollt Ihr mit eigenen Augen sehen, was sich dort befindet."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! J'ai de nouvelles informations concernant l'appareil xénos que vous avez découvert lors de votre... absence. Depuis votre retour, les technoprêtres ont travaillé sans relâche à comprendre la nature de cette technologie mystérieuse et ils semblent avoir réussi, tout du moins en partie. Après bien des rituels et des prières au Dieu-Machine, ils sont parvenus à éveiller le xéno-artefact. L'espace d'un instant, il a affiché une copie holographique d'une planète et des coordonnées localisées dans la Ceinture de Langrenn. Si cela vous intéresse, vous pourriez aller voir par vous-même de quoi il retourne. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! J'ai de nouvelles informations concernant l'appareil xénos que vous avez découvert lors de votre... absence. Depuis votre retour, les technoprêtres ont travaillé sans relâche à comprendre la nature de cette technologie mystérieuse et ils semblent avoir réussi, tout du moins en partie. Après bien des rituels et des prières au Dieu-Machine, ils sont parvenus à éveiller le xéno-artefact. L'espace d'un instant, il a affiché une copie holographique d'une planète et des coordonnées localisées dans la Ceinture de Langrenn. Si cela vous intéresse, vous pourriez aller voir par vous-même de quoi il retourne. »

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Traigo noticias sobre el dispositivo xenos que descubrió durante su... ausencia. Desde que ha vuelto, los tecnosacerdotes se esfuerzan por comprender la naturaleza de esta tecnología misteriosa y, hasta cierto punto, lo han conseguido. Tras muchos rituales y plegarias al Dios Máquina, han despertado el xenoartefacto. Por un momento, ha producido una copia holográfica de un planeta y coordenadas que pertenecen al Cinturón de Langrenn. Tal vez le interese ver personalmente lo que alberga el lugar».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Traigo noticias sobre el dispositivo xenos que descubrió durante su... ausencia. Desde que ha vuelto, los tecnosacerdotes se esfuerzan por comprender la naturaleza de esta tecnología misteriosa y, hasta cierto punto, lo han conseguido. Tras muchos rituales y plegarias al Dios Máquina, han despertado el xenoartefacto. Por un momento, ha producido una copia holográfica de un planeta y coordenadas que pertenecen al Cinturón de Langrenn. Tal vez le interese ver personalmente lo que alberga el lugar».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！あなたの留守中に発見した…ゼノデバイスに関する新情報をお伝えします。あなたが戻ってきて以来、技術司祭たちはこの謎めいたテクノロジーの性質を理解するためにあらゆる努力を重ねてきており、ある程度の成功を収めました。何度も儀式を行い、機械神に懇願した結果、彼らは異種族のアーティファクトを目覚めさせたのです。一瞬ですが、ラングレンズベルトにある惑星と座標がホログラムで表示されました。この目的地がどうなっているか、陛下自身の目で確認なさった方が良いでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！あなたの留守中に発見した…ゼノデバイスに関する新情報をお伝えします。あなたが戻ってきて以来、技術司祭たちはこの謎めいたテクノロジーの性質を理解するためにあらゆる努力を重ねてきており、ある程度の成功を収めました。何度も儀式を行い、機械神に懇願した結果、彼らは異種族のアーティファクトを目覚めさせたのです。一瞬ですが、ラングレンズベルトにある惑星と座標がホログラムで表示されました。この目的地がどうなっているか、陛下自身の目で確認なさった方が良いでしょう」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Iı... Seyahatiniz esnasında keşfettiğiniz zeno cihazıyla ilgili yeni malumatım var. Dönüşünüzden bu yana Tekno Rahipler, bu esrarengiz teknolojinin doğasını çözmek için canla başla çalışmaktaydı. Nihayetinde başarılı oldular, yani bir nevi. Makine Tanrı'ya çok kez yalvarıp yakardıktan sonra zeno eserinden bir tepki almakta muvaffak oldular. Bu eser bir an için Langrenn Kuşağı'yla eşleşen koordinatların yanı sıra bir gezegenin holografik kopyasını gösterdi. Dilerseniz bu yere şahsen gidip olan biteni kendi gözlerinizle görebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I bring you new information about the xenodevice that you discovered during your... time away. Ever since your return, the Tech-Priests have been making every effort to comprehend the nature of this mysterious technology — and they have succeeded, to an extent. After many rituals and pleas to the Machine God, they awakened the xeno-artefact. For but a moment, it produced a holographic copy of a planet and coordinates that matched a location in Langrenn's Belt. Perhaps you will wish to see with your own eyes what this destination holds."
